body.section: The business processes encoded by the IHTSDO Workbench DWFA Framework are JavaBeans, and can be transported in a transport layer independent manner.

The current implementation provides support for using Subversion, SMTP (as a MIME attachment), and Java RMI as the transport layer. Alternative transport layers that use MIME attachments and that have available Java implementations are trivial to support. Processes external to the DFWA framework can also support other transport layers such as FTP or CD-ROM combined with Sneaker Net or postal delivery services.
